changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Initial visit", "Follow-up", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "SA, Visit type");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to SA, Visit type

changeSet.author: Tarun
